categories.title: Recent Updates to the Eliza Project

content.text:
The Eliza project has seen numerous improvements across various areas:

**Features and Enhancements:**
- Added support for SUI blockchain with the 'suiprivatekey0x' account type (PR #1693)
- Improved GOAT integration by enabling tool calling when using generateText (PR #1403)
- Added web search capabilities to the agent (PR #1676, #1577)
- Added documentation for the story plugin (PR #1672)
- Added echo chambers to agent functionality (PR #1719)
- Enhanced EternalAI provider with request/response logging capabilities (PR #1740)
- Improved NEAR plugin by replacing console.log with Eliza logger (PR #1745)
- Implemented custom conditions for live monorepo types (PR #1365)
- Enhanced EVM plugin wallet provider and transfer actions (PR #1701)

**Bug Fixes:**
- Fixed URL issues in ImageDescriptionService (PR #1696)
- Resolved smoke test failures (PR #1695)
- Fixed token trimming by removing unnecessary await (PR #1686)
- Fixed Twitter image link issues (PR #1671)
- Improved image description service (PR #1667, #1664)
- Updated Supabase schema.sql (PR #1660)
- Enhanced Windows compatibility for Vite dev server (PR #1760)
- Fixed build lint errors (PR #1759)
- Added support for non-OpenAI models in token trimming (PR #1605)
- Disabled trust provider for PostgreSQL database (PR #1536)
- Removed nonsensical schema check in postgres-adapter (PR #1377)
- Fixed multiple web search import in agent (PR #1718)

**Documentation and Maintenance:**
- Updated README.md to fix spelling issues (PR #1690)
- Improved Korean translations in README_KOR.md (PR #1683, #1739)
- Updated repository references from ai16z/eliza to elizaOS/eliza (PR #1679)
- Added Serbian README translation (PR #1757)
- Updated FAQ documentation (PR #1746)
- Improved Twitter username validation message (PR #1698)
- Updated web search plugin export (PR #1688)
- Removed unused imports in zksync-era (PR #1716)

categories.title: Recent Issues in the elizaOS/eliza GitHub Repository

content.text:
The elizaOS/eliza GitHub repository is experiencing several technical issues across different components of the system. These include:

1. Database connectivity problems: Issue #1687 reports failures when starting the agent with PostgreSQL.

2. Build failures: Issue #1680 documents build failures specifically in the @elizaos/client-lens package.

3. Image processing limitations: Issue #1694 highlights problems with the Image Description Service when handling unsupported image formats.

4. Model integration issues: Issue #1709 reports that the Google Model is not functioning properly, while Issue #1772 addresses discrepancies when using different models for image processing versus base functionality.

5. Performance concerns: Issue #1758 notes very slow pnpm start times, affecting development efficiency.

6. API and proxy errors: Issue #1669 documents HTTP proxy errors when handling specific message endpoints.

7. Wallet integration problems: Issue #1780 reports issues with Solana wallet detection, showing "Public Solana Wallet Not Found!".

8. Hardware compatibility issues: Issue #1747 describes runtime exceptions on Jetson hardware related to sqlite-vec extension loading failures.

9. Documentation improvements: Issue #1720 suggests serving Docusaurus documentation from a Docker container to improve the documentation verification process.

categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in the elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
The elizaOS/eliza repository has seen significant development activity with multiple pull requests focused on enhancing documentation, adding new blockchain integrations, and improving existing functionality.

Documentation improvements include PR #1551 adding JSDoc documentation for the repository and PR #1675 introducing a multilingual Agentic Eliza Plugin Documenter supporting English, Spanish, and French.

Several new blockchain integrations have been added through pull requests, including support for Ordinals and Runes (PR #1699), an Injective plugin (PR #1764), a Cardano Blockchain Plugin (PR #1768), and an EVM OZ governance plugin (PR #1710).

Functionality improvements include PR #1403 enhancing GOAT integration by enabling tool calling when using generateText, PR #1750 fixing PGVector embedding validation, and PR #1717 merging develop into main for the 1.7.0 release.

Additionally, PR #1771 introduces Kavi to the project, though specific details about this contribution are not provided in the source.

The crypto market shows price changes for several cryptocurrencies. WETH has increased from $3,353.25 to $3,450.38, representing a gain of approximately 2.9%. SOL has risen from $193.88 to $208.04, showing a significant increase of about 7.3%. WBTC has moved up from $94,207.76 to $96,643.07, gaining around 2.6%. The ai16z token has also seen positive movement, rising from $2.19 to $2.37, an increase of approximately 8.2%.

The elizaos/eliza repository showed increased activity over two consecutive days. On January 3, 2025, there were 31 new PRs (18 merged), 11 new issues, and 61 active contributors. Activity increased the following day with 43 new PRs (14 merged), 24 new issues, and 69 active contributors. While the number of new PRs and issues grew, the percentage of merged PRs decreased from approximately 58% to 33%.
sources: From 2025-01-02 to 2025-01-03, elizaos/eliza had 31 new PRs (18 merged), 11 new issues, and 61 active contributors.
From 2025-01-03 to 2025-01-04, elizaos/eliza had 43 new PRs (14 merged), 24 new issues, and 69 active contributors.
